steps: 1. Originator deposits $500,000 into shell company A (UK jurisdiction)
2. Shell A transfers $150,000 to shell B (Singapore jurisdiction) as 'consulting fees'
3. Shell B sends $100,000 to shell C (Panama jurisdiction) as 'investment management'
4. Shell C transfers $50,000 to shell A in multiple structured $8,000 transactions
5. Shell A reclassifies funds as 'dividends' to shell D (BVI jurisdiction)
6. Shell D purchases $120,000 in cryptocurrency through an offshore exchange
7. Cryptocurrency transferred to shell E (Delaware, USA) via obfuscated wallet addresses
8. Final integration: Shell E invests $330,000 in a legitimate UK import/export business
